nodes.text: This drunk-driving PSA is a short public service announcement (PSA) released by the United States Department of Transportation's National Highway and Safety Administration in 1979. The announcement features characters from the Mos Eisley Cantina scenes of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and The Star Wars Holiday Special.

Over a scene of a crowd of aliens carousing in the cantina, an announcer describes the situation: when a Talz patron becomes inebriated, a Duros patron offers to drive the Talz home rather than allowing the drunk to drive home intoxicated. The pair then zoom away in a YT-1300 light freighter.
